about_the_game:
Fairytale Furnishing is a game about interior designing and furnishing homes for fairy tale heroes. Customize the princess's tower, the hero's cabin, or the witch's cottage to your taste. Unlock new items. Revisit completed locations to decorate them differently. In the process, uncover the story that connects the characters with each other.

Furnish:


Across game levels, you'll find yourself in the empty abodes of fairy tale characters - like a princess's tower or a witch's den. You'll furnish their homes, placing furniture and other items, thereby better revealing the personalities of their owners. Don't worry - the game doesn't rush you or challenge you with difficult tasks - just enjoy furnishing the homes at your leisure.

Unlock:


As you furnish, you'll be able to unlock new items to create more original interiors. Over time, you'll get acquainted with the story and unlock the next level, so you can move on whenever you wish.

Choose:


Fairytale Furnishing is a relaxing sandbox game with story elements. This means you can jump into any of the levels you've previously unlocked at any moment and start from the last save. You can rearrange, remove, and place new items. You can even clear a level and start it over to furnish it in a completely different way.

Smile:


In this tale, there's a beautiful princess, an evil witch, a brave hero, and a stern king - seems straightforward, right? But the plot isn't as clichéd as it might seem - this world also has (wireless) internet, and the characters may not be who they seem to be.



Enjoy the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 600 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 7000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy decorating fairytale homes in this small, cozy game, suitable for those who love interior design and a fairy-tale atmosphere. Meet unique characters and explore a playful narrative. No rush, no hard tasks—just pure relaxation with a touch of magic and Wi-Fi.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
